text: is a Japanese actress. She appeared in Mikio Naruse's Floating Clouds (1955) and Nagareru (1956). She also appeared in Shinji Aoyama's My God, My God, Why Hast Thou Forsaken Me? (2005). She is married to director Yoshishige Yoshida. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors
title: Mariko Okada
